{"id":1034672563,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1693280946,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1034672563/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Pivot Integer","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotInteger(int n) {\n        if (n == 1)\n            return 1;\n        int left_sum = 0, right_sum = 0;\n        for (auto i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            left_sum += i;\n            right_sum = 0; \n            for (auto j = i; j <= n; j++)\n                right_sum += j;\n            if (left_sum == right_sum) {\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-pivot-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
